short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Exposing Steve Bannon's role in some of the most dangerous and unconstitutional actions taken by Trump's Administration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A white supremacist is calling the shots in Donald Trump's White House. This extension exposes Steve Bannon's role in some of the most dangerous and unconstitutional actions taken by Trump's Administration.
